alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Morrill, southwestern Dawes and southeastern Sioux Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Flahertys Corner to 8 miles northeast of Lake Alice. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kilpatrick Lake, Flahertys Corner and Marsland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
